title: (x) Dennis logo retro script - Philly Sport Script {Florian}
content:
If any one has any ideas what this retro style font is i'd be very grateful. I'm pretty sure it's not a custom logo and it's not Candice or Benguait Charisma. Any other suggestions would be great.

Thanks  
Rich.
